## Assignment 1 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(mice) #package for imputation
library(VIM)
```
## Load in data set 

```{r}
class_grades <- read_csv("class-grades.csv")
```

```{r}
str(class_grades)
summary(class_grades)
skim(class_grades)
```

```{r}
gg_miss_case(class_grades)
```

```{r}
grades = class_grades %>% drop_na() 
skim(grades)
```
```{r}
class <- class_grades %>% select(where(~ !any(is.na(.))))
vim_plot = aggr(class, numbers = TRUE, prop = c(TRUE, FALSE),cex.axis=.7)
skim(class)
```
```{r}
set.seed(123) #sets seed for random number generator
new_grades = mice(class_grades, m=5, method='pmm', printFlag=FALSE)
summary(new_grades)
```
```{r}
densityplot(new_grades, ~Final)
```
```{r}
grades_complete = complete(new_grades) 
summary(grades_complete )
```
